headline: Why The Trade Desk (TTD) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of digital advertising platform The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) jumped 4.5% in the afternoon session after investors reacted positively to news that a key competitor, Google, faced an antitrust trial that could force the breakup of its advertising technology business.
